description.zh-cn: 台湾外科医师、政治人物，台湾民众党创党主席，曾任台北市市长、国立台湾大学医学院教授、台大医院医师。
description.en: A Taiwanese surgeon and politician, who is the founder and former chairman of the Taiwan People's Party. He has served as the Mayor of Taipei, a professor at the National Taiwan University College of Medicine, and a physician at the National Taiwan University Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党，由柯文哲于2019年创立。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan founded by Ko Wen-je in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Taipei City, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的妻子，现任台北市立联合医院和平妇幼院区中正门诊部主任。
description.en: Wife of Ko Wen-je, currently the director of the Zhongzheng Clinic at the Heping Fuyou Branch of Taipei City Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的父亲，曾为新竹市东园国小教师。
description.en: Father of Ko Wen-je, a former teacher at Dongyuan Elementary School in Hsinchu City.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的母亲，退休公务员。
description.en: Mother of Ko Wen-je, a retired civil servant.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的妹妹，台大医院新竹医院医师、国立清华大学合聘教授。
description.en: Sister of Ko Wen-je, a physician at National Taiwan University Hospital Hsinchu Branch and an adjunct professor at National Tsing Hua University.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的祖父，曾在228事件中被捕，后病逝。
description.en: Grandfather of Ko Wen-je, who was arrested during the 228 Incident and later died of illness.

description.zh-cn: 1947年于台湾发生的事件，起因于专卖局查缉员在台北市查缉私烟不当，后续引发大规模民众反抗政府与军警镇压。
description.en: An anti-government uprising in Taiwan that was violently suppressed by the Kuomintang-led Republic of China government, which killed thousands of civilians beginning on February 28, 1947.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，现任台湾民众党代理主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician, currently serving as the acting chairman of the Taiwan People's Party.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任台北市市长，为柯文哲的前任。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the Mayor of Taipei, he was the predecessor to Ko Wen-je.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，现任台北市市长，为柯文哲的继任者。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician currently serving as the Mayor of Taipei, succeeding Ko Wen-je.

en: National Taiwan University College of Medicine

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学的学院之一，是柯文哲的母校及曾任教之处。
description.en: One of the colleges of National Taiwan University, it is Ko Wen-je's alma mater and former workplace.

nodes.id: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

zh-cn: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

description.zh-cn: 台湾一所公立医院，柯文哲曾在此长期担任医师及多项主管职务。
description.en: A public hospital in Taiwan where Ko Wen-je worked for a long time as a physician and held several administrative positions.

description.zh-cn: 台湾心脏外科医师，柯文哲的老师，曾任台大医院外科主任。
description.en: A Taiwanese cardiac surgeon and mentor to Ko Wen-je, who formerly served as the Director of Surgery at National Taiwan University Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 一种医疗急救设备，又称“体外膜氧合”，柯文哲是台湾引进并推广此技术的关键人物之一。
description.en: A medical emergency device, also known as Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation (ECMO). Ko Wen-je was one of the key figures in introducing and promoting this technology in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十、十一任总统，柯文哲曾是其竞选后援会干部，并在其入狱后担任民间医疗小组召集人。
description.en: The 10th and 11th-term President of the Republic of China. Ko Wen-je was a member of his campaign support group and later served as the convener of a civilian medical team for him after his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 胡志强的妻子，曾因车祸重伤，在柯文哲建议下使用叶克膜成功获救。
description.en: Wife of Jason Hu, who was successfully treated with ECMO at Ko Wen-je's suggestion after suffering severe injuries in a car accident.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾在枪击案后由柯文哲的医疗团队救治。后在2014年台北市长选举中与柯文哲成为竞争对手。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who was treated by Ko Wen-je's medical team after a shooting incident. He later became Ko's opponent in the 2014 Taipei mayoral election.

nodes.id: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案

zh-cn: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案

description.zh-cn: 2011年台湾发生的医疗事故，台大医院将一名爱滋病感染者的器官移植给五名病患。柯文哲因此事件受到惩处，并称此事件是其决定参选的主因。
description.en: A medical incident in Taiwan in 2011, where National Taiwan University Hospital transplanted organs from an HIV-positive donor to five patients. Ko Wen-je was disciplined for this incident and stated it was the main reason for his decision to run for office.

description.zh-cn: 一宗指控柯文哲在台北市长任内图利京华城集团的案件，导致柯文哲被羁押及起诉。
description.en: A case accusing Ko Wen-je of illicitly benefiting Core Pacific Group during his tenure as Taipei Mayor, which led to his detention and indictment.

description.zh-cn: 指控柯文哲在2024年总统选举期间政治献金申报不实的案件。
description.en: A case accusing Ko Wen-je of making false declarations of political donations during the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的司法机关，负责侦办及起诉柯文哲所涉的京华城案等案件。
description.en: A judicial body in Taiwan responsible for investigating and prosecuting cases involving Ko Wen-je, such as the Core Pacific City case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的司法机关，负责审理柯文哲所涉的京华城案，并裁定对其进行羁押。
description.en: A judicial body in Taiwan responsible for trying the Core Pacific City case involving Ko Wen-je and ordering his detention.

description.zh-cn: 美国作家，在其著作《屠杀》中指控柯文哲涉及器官活摘事件并称其为骗子。
description.en: An American author who, in his book 'The Slaughter,' accused Ko Wen-je of being involved in organ harvesting and called him a liar.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第十六任总统、副总统选举，柯文哲作为台湾民众党候选人参选但最终败选。
description.en: The 16th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China, in which Ko Wen-je ran as the Taiwan People's Party candidate but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，中国国民党籍，在2024年总统选举中为柯文哲的竞争对手之一。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician from the Kuomintang, who was one of Ko Wen-je's competitors in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，在2024年总统选举中击败柯文哲等人当选总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician from the Democratic Progressive Party who defeated Ko Wen-je and others to be elected president in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，台湾民众党籍，在2024年总统选举中担任柯文哲的副总统候选人。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician from the Taiwan People's Party who was Ko Wen-je's vice-presidential running mate in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲东部的地区，柯文哲曾多次前往参加医学会议并传入叶克膜技术。
description.en: A region in East Asia to which Ko Wen-je traveled multiple times for medical conferences and introduced ECMO technology.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲于2019年8月6日创立台湾民众党，并担任首任党主席。
description.en: Ko Wen-je founded the Taiwan People's Party on August 6, 2019, and served as its first chairman.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲担任台湾民众党第一、二届党主席，后于2025年1月1日请辞。
description.en: Ko Wen-je served as the first and second-term chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, resigning on January 1, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲担任台北市第六、七届市长。
description.en: Ko Wen-je served as the 6th and 7th-term Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲的祖父柯世元在228事件清乡期间被捕并遭殴打，返家后卧床三年多后病逝。
description.en: Ko Wen-je's grandfather, Ko Shih-yuan, was arrested and beaten during the cleanup campaign of the 228 Incident. After returning home, he was bedridden for over three years before passing away.

degree.zh-cn: 医学系学士、临床医学研究所博士
degree.en: Bachelor of Medicine, PhD in Clinical Medicine

position.zh-cn: 专任助理教授、专任副教授、专任教授

relationships.target: 国立台湾大学医学院附设医院

position.zh-cn: 外科部住院医师、外科加护病房主任、创伤医学部主任
position.en: Surgical Resident, Director of Surgical ICU, Director of Department of Traumatology

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲受其师朱树勋影响选择外科，并在其指派下建立台大器官移植小组。
description.en: Influenced by his mentor Chu Shu-hsun, Ko Wen-je chose surgery and established the organ transplant team at NTUH under his direction.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲是叶克膜技术在台湾的推手之一，显著提高了病患存活率。
description.en: Ko Wen-je was one of the pioneers of ECMO technology in Taiwan, significantly improving patient survival rates.

description.zh-cn: 在邵晓铃因车祸重伤昏迷后，柯文哲建议并指派团队为其安装叶克膜，最终使其康复。
description.en: After Shao Hsiao-ling was severely injured and in a coma from a car accident, Ko Wen-je suggested and dispatched a team to install ECMO, leading to her recovery.

description.zh-cn: 在连胜文枪击案中，柯文哲参与的台大医院医疗团队成功抢救了连胜文。
description.en: In the Sean Lien shooting incident, the medical team at NTUH, including Ko Wen-je, successfully saved his life.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲与连胜文在2014年台北市长选举中为主要竞争对手。
description.en: Ko Wen-je and Sean Lien were the main competitors in the 2014 Taipei mayoral election.

relationships.source: 台大医院失误移植爱滋病患器官案

description.zh-cn: 因台大医院误将爱滋病患者器官用于移植，身为器官移植小组负责人的柯文哲遭到监察院弹劾及公惩会降级改叙处分。
description.en: Due to NTUH mistakenly using organs from an HIV-positive donor for transplantation, Ko Wen-je, as the head of the organ transplant team, was impeached by the Control Yuan and demoted by the Public Functionary Disciplinary Sanction Commission.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲担任陈水扁民间医疗小组召集人，发起连署希望法务部能让陈水扁保外就医。
description.en: Ko Wen-je served as the convener of a civilian medical team for Chen Shui-bian, initiating a petition calling for his release on medical parole.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲代表台湾民众党参选2024年中华民国总统选举，但在三组候选人中得票率最低，未能当选。
description.en: Ko Wen-je represented the Taiwan People's Party in the 2024 ROC presidential election but failed to win, receiving the lowest vote share among the three candidates.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲因在市长任内涉入京华城容积率案，遭台北地检署调查，并于2024年9月被羁押禁见，同年12月被起诉。
description.en: Ko Wen-je was investigated by the Taipei District Prosecutors Office for his involvement in the Core Pacific City floor area ratio case during his term as mayor, was detained incommunicado in September 2024, and indicted in December of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲因被指控在2024年总统选举中政治献金申报不实而受到调查。
description.en: Ko Wen-je was investigated for allegedly making false declarations of political donations during the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国作家伊森·葛特曼指控柯文哲在中国器官移植事件中担任中间人，并称其为骗子。
description.en: American author Ethan Gutmann accused Ko Wen-je of acting as a middleman in China's organ transplant affairs and called him a liar.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲与时任立法委员吴欣盈搭档，正式登记参选2024年中华民国总统、副总统。
description.en: Ko Wen-je officially registered to run for President and Vice President of the Republic of China in 2024, with then-Legislator Cynthia Wu as his running mate.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲与侯友宜在2024年总统选举中为竞争对手，此前双方就“蓝白合”进行谈判但最终破局。
description.en: Ko Wen-je and Hou Yu-ih were competitors in the 2024 presidential election, following the breakdown of negotiations for a KMT-TPP coalition.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲与赖清德在2024年总统选举中为竞争对手。
description.en: Ko Wen-je and Lai Ching-te were competitors in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲就美河市案评论时任基隆立委候选人郝龙斌，称“如果郝龙斌对美河市案什么都不知道的话，可以去死一死”，引发争议。
description.en: Commenting on the MeHAS City case, Ko Wen-je stated that if KMT Keelung legislative candidate Hau Lung-pin 'knew nothing about the MeHAS City case, he could go die,' causing controversy.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲请辞台湾民众党主席后，由黄国昌接任代理主席。
description.en: After Ko Wen-je resigned as chairman of the Taiwan People's Party, Huang Kuo-chang took over as acting chairman.

description.zh-cn: 蒋万安接替柯文哲担任台北市市长。
description.en: Chiang Wan-an succeeded Ko Wen-je as Mayor of Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 2000年后，柯文哲至中国大陆参加多次医学会议，将叶克膜技术传入中国大陆。
description.en: After 2000, Ko Wen-je attended multiple medical conferences in mainland China and introduced ECMO technology to the region.
